mapper.insert: insert into gms_board(g_no, memb_no, content) values(#{groupNo}, #{writer.no}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT b.content, b.reg_dt, m.memb_no writer_no, m.membername writer_name FROM gms_board b LEFT OUTER JOIN gms_memb m ON b.memb_no = m.memb_no WHERE b.b_no = #{no};

SELECT b.g_no, b.b_no, b.content, b.reg_dt, m.memb_no writer_no, m.membername writer_name, m.email writer_email, comment.* FROM gms_board b LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT c.content cmt_content , gm.membername cmt_writer_name, c.reg_dt cmt_reg_dt, c.b_no FROM gms_comment c , gms_memb gm WHERE c.memb_no =gm.memb_no ) comment ON b.b_no = comment.b_no LEFT OUTER JOIN gms_memb m ON b.memb_no = m.memb_no WHERE b.g_no = #{no} ORDER BY b.b_no DESC

SELECT b.g_no, b.b_no, b.content, b.reg_dt, m.memb_no writer_no, m.membername writer_name, m.email writer_email, comment.* FROM gms_board b LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT c.cmt_no, c.content cmt_content, gm.memb_no cmt_writer_no,gm.membername cmt_writer_name, c.reg_dt cmt_reg_dt, c.b_no FROM gms_comment c , gms_memb gm WHERE c.memb_no =gm.memb_no ) comment ON b.b_no = comment.b_no LEFT OUTER JOIN gms_memb m ON b.memb_no = m.memb_no WHERE b.b_no = #{no} ORDER BY comment.cmt_no DESC;

select b.b_no, b.content, b.reg_dt, m.memb_no writer_no, m.name writer_name, c.cmt_no, c.content cmt_content, c.reg_dt cmt_reg_dt, m2.memb_no cmt_writer_no, m2.name cmt_writer_name from gms_board b left outer join gms_comment c on b.b_no = c.b_no left outer join gms_memb m on b.memb_no = m.memb_no left outer join gms_memb m2 on c.memb_no = m2.memb_no order by b_no desc
